If we ask allies and partners to fight alongside us, we are committing to be there for each other to fight common threats.

In the short term, the quick timeline opens up the risk of attack, of disorganization, and provides an opportunity to our enemies.

But in the long-run, it may be even more harmful.

Fighting #ClimateChange is not just the moral thing to do, but also the wise thing to do to secure the financial futures of hard-working Americans. Now, let‚Äôs get to work on getting the #RESPONDAct passed into law!

The data we‚Äôve seen to date is clear: #ClimateChange poses a massive risk to our economy, & this bill will ensure the retirement benefits of millions of federal workers are protected from those risks.

The more we examine how #ClimateChange impacts our financial system, the better we can protect the livelihoods of  our nation‚Äôs valuable workforce, while incentivizing corporations to quickly transition to renewable energy sources.
